name: V.E.C.S.
summary: Lobaki's new Virtual Electrical Circuits Simulator (VECS) is an immersive hands-on tool for students to learn about electronics like never before. With over a dozen embedded lessons, students are guided through the foundations of electricity and mechatronics by building and analyzing their own circuits. VECS accurately simulates real-world components like lightbulbs, batteries, resistors, capacitors, switches, motors, and more. The simulation even includes a multimeter, allowing students to measure the...
